title: Get Information on a Public Construction Project
description: A resident is asking for the timeline and scope of a road construction project happening on their street.

tasks.description: Identify the specific construction project based on the location provided by the resident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the 'Main Street Repaving' project in the system.

tasks.description: Retrieve the project's public information, including scope, expected duration, and work hours.
Provide a summary of the project information to the resident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the project scope and timeline to the resident.
